column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rachal - Thank you very much for the great review. We appreciate your kind words and descriptions of our restaurant. As far as pricing is concerned
column2: we do feel our rates are commensurate with most eateries in Midtown
column3: which is by far one of the more expensive areas of Houston. Nevertheless
column4: we appreciate your coming through and we hope to serve you again soon.
